channels.name: allnews
channels.welcome_message: Welcome to #allnews! Stay updated with the latest in anime & manga news.
channels.pinned_message: This channel aggregates news from various sources. Check frequently for updates!

channels.name: animein
channels.welcome_message: Here's your go-to for all anime-specific announcements!
channels.pinned_message: Only anime news here! No manga spoilers.

channels.name: mangain
channels.welcome_message: Get the latest manga news and updates here!
channels.pinned_message: Dedicated to manga announcements. Discuss theories in #manga-discussion!

channels.name: trailers-teasers
channels.welcome_message: Catch the newest anime and manga trailers!
channels.pinned_message: New trailers posted as soon as they drop! Enjoy the previews.

channels.name: episode-alerts
channels.welcome_message: Never miss a new episode!
channels.pinned_message: Alerts for currently airing anime episodes. Spoilers may be present!

channels.name: manga-chapters
channels.welcome_message: Stay updated with the latest manga chapter releases!
channels.pinned_message: Fresh manga chapters as they're released. Discuss in #manga-discussion.

channels.name: upcominganime
channels.welcome_message: Discover what's coming next in the anime world!
channels.pinned_message: Upcoming anime announcements, release dates, and cast info.

channels.name: upcomingmanga
channels.welcome_message: Find out about future manga releases and series!
channels.pinned_message: Get a sneak peek at manga series on the horizon.

channels.name: release-calendars
channels.welcome_message: Your weekly guide to anime and manga releases!
channels.pinned_message: Check here for the latest weekly release schedules.

channels.name: ratings
channels.welcome_message: See how anime and manga titles are rated by the community!
channels.pinned_message: Discussions about popularity, reviews, and ratings for various titles.

channels.name: trending-weekly
channels.welcome_message: What's hot right now? Find out the top trending titles of the week!
channels.pinned_message: Weekly compilation of the most talked-about anime and manga.

channels.name: monthly
channels.welcome_message: Your monthly dose of anime & manga highlights!
channels.pinned_message: Recaps of the past month's major news, releases, and discussions.

channels.name: anime-discussion
channels.welcome_message: General chat about all things anime!
channels.pinned_message: Be respectful and avoid spoilers unless properly tagged.

channels.name: manga-discussion
channels.welcome_message: Dive into discussions about your favorite manga and theories!
channels.pinned_message: Spoilers for new chapters are expected here. Discuss freely!

channels.name: recommendations
channels.welcome_message: Need a new watch or read? Ask for or give recommendations!
channels.pinned_message: Help others discover new favorites. Use !recommend for bot suggestions.

channels.name: spoiler-zone
channels.welcome_message: This is a safe space for spoilers! Enter at your own risk.
channels.pinned_message: All spoilers are allowed here. You've been warned!

channels.name: fanart-showcase
channels.welcome_message: Share your amazing anime and manga fanart!
channels.pinned_message: Original creations or curated art. Please credit artists!

channels.name: anime-memes
channels.welcome_message: Got a funny anime meme? Post it here!
channels.pinned_message: Keep it clean and anime-related. Laughter is the best medicine!

channels.name: anime-events
channels.welcome_message: Stay informed about anime conventions, streams, and meetups!
channels.pinned_message: Local and online events for the anime community.

channels.name: dailyanimequote
channels.welcome_message: A daily dose of wisdom and inspiration from anime characters!
channels.pinned_message: Check back every day for a new quote!

channels.name: bot-commands
channels.welcome_message: This is where you can interact with the bot using commands!
channels.pinned_message: Type !help for a list of commands. Please use this channel for bot commands only.
